definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]

sentences.english: Micro - electroforming is characterized by both resist - patterned electroplating and resist - structural electrodepositing.
sentences.chinese: 微電鑄工藝兼具掩膜電鍍和厚膜結構電鑄的雙重特徵。

sentences.english: Effect of Micronization on the Quality of Salvia miltiorrhiza Bge.
sentences.chinese: 微粉化對丹蔘質量影響的研究。

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就難溶藥物與中草藥微細化技術作出探索性研究。

sentences.english: Methods Bone Marrow Micronuclei (BMM) assay in mice was used.
sentences.chinese: 方法小鼠骨髓微核試驗。

sentences.english: Do I have to dump the microformatting?
sentences.chinese: 我是否必須轉儲微格式？

sentences.english: The present invention also describes the uses of the combination in the production of microgel.
sentences.chinese: 還描述了其用於生產微凝膠體的用途。

sentences.english: You decide to use a microflow process to scope the unit of work.
sentences.chinese: 您決定使用微流程來界定該工作單元的範圍。

sentences.english: The non silicon micro machining process and some devices such as different kinds of micro hinges are reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了非硅微機械工藝和微絞鏈的研製工藝。

sentences.english: Getting started with microformats is easy.
sentences.chinese: 開始使用微格式非常簡單。

sentences.english: It is difficult to achieve the precision measurement of the position of the micro holes with traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 微小孔系的精密測量用傳統的手段是難以實現的。

sentences.english: The invention is a microminiature high rotating speed tool shank, relating to electromechanical integration field.
sentences.chinese: 本發明爲一種微小型高轉速刀柄，屬機電一體化領域。

sentences.english: Water in microporosity or other small pores.
sentences.chinese: 微孔隙或其它小孔隙中的水。

sentences.english: So far in this article, I have only considered microbenchmarks.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，到目前爲止只考慮了微基準測試。
從不隱藏微單元框體窗口。

sentences.english: Calorimeter can only measure optical pulse energy of nanoJoules.
sentences.chinese: 研製了用於測量皮焦爾量級光脈衝的微能量計。

sentences.english: It was originally designed for the pilot Clone Wars micro-series.
sentences.chinese: 它原本是爲《克隆人戰爭》微系列劇的飛行員設計的。

definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to search (a place)/to search (a database etc)
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
